FAQs

QUESTIONS

Frequently Asked Questions

Are You Ready to Innovate With Us?

Contact Us
What is Salama Engineering mission and core values?

Our mission is the very foundation based on which we uphold the principles of trust and integrity in each and every policy provided to our clients. We believe in protecting everything which you value the most.

What types of projects does Salama Engineering undertake?

We make various types of heat exchangers for oil & gas and petrochemical and HVAC industries. We are also involved in every step from beginning to the end.

Does Salama Engineering offer consulting services on new technologies?

Yes, we offer consultancy and project management services. It includes focus on advancing engineering and technology solutions.

What does Salama Engineering do to maintain quality and safety?

We maintain high quality standards using advanced facilities and experienced work forces. Every product has to be safety tested more than once.

How does Salama Engineering assist in completing projects within the specified time and cost?

We follow a customer-centric approach and provide engineering solutions that are customized to fit the most specific needs of every client. This way we put projects back on track and completed within budget and schedule.

Get In Touch
